text:
Gerald Peter Buchek (May 9, 1942 – January 2, 2019) was a American professional baseball player. He was an infielder over all or parts of seven Major League Baseball seasons (1961, 1963–1968) with the St. Louis Cardinals and New York Mets. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri.
Buchek died on January 2, 2019 in Springfield, Missouri at the age of 76.
